column2: so I belly up to the bar.  But
column3: what made the whole meal?  The bartender - I asked him to recommend a local beer.  He asked what I liked and then just poured it.  No samples
column5: unabashed confidence in his palate.  I like it!  And
column6: he was right - he picked a beer that was unique and different and I really enjoyed it.  He was prompt
column7: he was attentive.   Staff was really with it!
